EigenMeat.EigenMaze
Class Physics

java.lang.Object
  EigenMeat.EigenMaze.Physics
public class Physics
extends java.lang.Object

A utility class with static methods for mobile collision handling.

checkEntityCollision

public static boolean checkEntityCollision(MobileEntity e1,
                                           MobileEntity e2)
Checks whether two MobileEntitys are colliding. The result is based on the MobileEntitys' bounding spheres.

Parameters:
e1 - the first entity.
e2 - the second entity.
Returns:
true if the entities are colliding; false if they are not colliding.

handleEntityCollision

public static void handleEntityCollision(MobileEntity e1,
                                         MobileEntity e2)
Bounces two entities off each other based on sphere collision.

Parameters:
e1 - the first entity.
e2 - the second entity.

handleEdgeCollision

public static void handleEdgeCollision(MobileEntity e1,
                                       Vect3d impact)
Bounces an entity off an unmoving point of collision associated with a wall edge.

Parameters:
e1 - the entity.
impact - the point of collision.
